verses.t: Go to{G71} now{G3568}, ye rich men{G4145}, weep{G2799} and howl{G3649} for{G1909} your{G5216} miseries{G3588} that shall come upon{G1904} you.
Your{G5216} riches{G3588} are corrupted{G4595}, and{G2532} your{G5216} garments{G3588} are{G1096} motheaten{G4598}.

Your{G5216} gold{G3588} and{G2532} silver{G3588} is cankered{G2728}; and{G2532} the rust{G3588} of them{G846} shall be{G2071} a witness{G3142} against{G1519} you{G5213}, and{G2532} shall eat{G5315} your{G5216} flesh{G3588} as it were{G5613} fire{G4442}. Ye have heaped treasure together{G2343} for{G1722} the last{G2078} days{G2250}.

Behold{G2400}, the hire{G3588} of the labourers{G3588} who have{G3588} reaped down{G270} your{G5216}fields{G3588}, which is of{G575} you{G5216} kept back by fraud{G650}, crieth{G2896}: and{G2532} the cries{G3588} of them{G3588} which have reaped{G2325} are entered{G1525} into{G1519} the ears{G3588} of the Lord{G2962} of sabaoth{G4519}.
Ye have lived in pleasure{G5171} on{G1909} the earth{G3588}, and{G2532} been wanton{G4684}; ye have nourished{G5142} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}, as{G5613} in{G1722} a day{G2250} of slaughter{G4967}.
Ye have condemned{G2613} and killed{G5407} the just{G1342}; and he doth{G498} not{G3756} resist{G498} you{G5213}.

Be patient{G3114} therefore{G3767}, brethren{G80}, unto{G2193} the coming{G3588} of the Lord{G3588}. Behold{G2400}, the husbandman{G3588} waiteth for{G1551} the precious{G5093} fruit{G2590} of the earth{G3588}, and hath long patience{G3114} for{G1909} it{G846}, until{G2193} he receive{G2983} the early{G4406} and{G2532} latter{G3797} rain{G5205}.
Be{G3114} ye{G5210} also{G2532} patient{G3114}; stablish{G4741} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}: for{G3754} the coming{G3588} of the Lord{G3588} draweth nigh{G1448}.
Grudge{G4727} not{G3361} one against{G2596} another{G240}, brethren{G80}, lest{G3361} ye be condemned{G2632}: behold{G2400}, the judge{G4253} standeth{G2476} before{G3588} the door{G2476}.

Take{G2983}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, the prophets{G3588}, who{G3739} have spoken{G2980} in the name{G3588} of the Lord{G2962}, for an example{G5262} of suffering affliction{G3588}, and{G2532} of patience{G3588}.

Behold{G2400}, we count{G3106} them{G3588} happy{G3106} which endure{G5278}. Ye have heard{G191} of the patience{G3588} of Job{G2492}, and{G2532} have seen{G1492} the end{G3588} of the Lord{G2962}; that{G3754} the Lord{G3588} is{G2076} very pitiful{G4184}, and{G2532} of tender mercy{G3629}.

But{G1161} above{G4253} all things{G3956}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, swear{G3660} not{G3361}, neither{G3383} by heaven{G3588}, neither{G3383} by the earth{G3588}, neither{G3383} by any{G5100} other{G243} oath{G3727}: but{G1161} let{G2277} your{G5216} yea{G3483} be{G2277} yea{G3483}; and{G2532} your nay{G3756}, nay{G3756}; lest{G2443} ye fall{G4098} into{G1519} condemnation{G5272}.NOTE! Extra word: "pas"
Is{G2553} any{G5100} among{G1722} you{G5213} afflicted{G2553}? let him pray{G4336}. Is{G2114} any{G5100} merry{G2114}? let him sing psalms{G5567}.

Is{G770} any{G5100} sick{G770} among{G1722} you{G5213}? let him call{G4341} for the elders{G4245} of the church{G3588}; and{G2532} let them pray{G4336} over{G1909} him{G846}, anointing{G218} him{G846} with oil{G1637} in{G1722} the name{G3588} of the Lord{G3588}:

And{G2532} the prayer{G3588} of faith{G3588} shall save{G4982} the sick{G2577}, and{G2532} the Lord{G3588} shall raise{G1453} him{G846} up{G1453}; and if{G2579} he have committed{G4160} sins{G266}, they{G863} shall be{G5600} forgiven{G863} him{G846}.

Confess{G1843} your faults{G3588} one to another{G240}, and{G2532} pray{G2172}one{G240} for{G5228} another{G240}, that{G3704} ye may be healed{G2390}. The effectual fervent{G1754} prayer{G1162} of a righteous man{G1342} availeth{G2480} much{G4183}.

Elias{G2243} was{G2258} a man{G444} subject to like passions{G3663} as we are{G2254}, and{G2532} he prayed{G4336} earnestly{G4335} that it might{G1026} not{G3361} rain{G1026}: and{G2532} it rained{G1026} not{G3756} on{G1909} the earth{G3588} by the space of three{G5140} years{G1763} and{G2532} six{G1803} months{G3376}.
And{G2532} he prayed{G4336} again{G3825}, and{G2532} the heaven{G3588} gave{G1325} rain{G5205}, and{G2532} the earth{G3588} brought forth{G985} her{G846} fruit{G3588}.
Brethren{G80}, if{G1437} any{G5100} of{G1722} you{G5213} do err{G4105} from{G575} the truth{G3588}, and{G2532} one{G5100} convert{G1994} him{G846};

Let him know{G1097}, that{G3754} he which converteth{G1994} the sinner{G268} from{G1537} the error{G4106} of his{G846} way{G3598} shall save{G4982} a soul{G5590} from{G1537} death{G2288}, and{G2532} shall hide{G2572} a multitude{G4128} of sins{G266}.
